report.title: MNHNL Dynamic 2 Supersamples List
report.description: Form Internal Report: Used by the Supersamples grid to retrieve the top level samples associated with a survey.
report.query: SELECT s.id, s.entered_sref as place, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type FROM samples s WHERE s.survey_id=#survey_id# AND s.deleted = FALSE AND s.parent_id is null #order_by#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for?
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
